Verses: 1 adhanpinbu Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkup Paskaavai Aasarikkumpadi Erusalemil Irukkira Karththarudaiya Aalayaththirku Vaarungal Endru Esekkiyaa Isravel Yoodhaa Engum Aatkalai Anuppinadhum Andri, Eppiraayeem Manaase Koththirangalukkum Nirubangalai Ezhudhiyanuppinaan.
2 paskaavai Irandaam Maadhaththil Aasarikkumpadi, Raajaavum Avanudaiya Prabukkalum Erusalemilulla Sabaiyaar Yaavarum Yosanaipanniyirundhaargal.
3 aasaariyar Podhumaanaper Thangalaip Parisuththampannaamalum, Janangal Erusalemil Innum Koodivaraamalum Irundhapadiyinaal, Adhin Kaalaththil Adhai Aasarikkak Koodaamarpoyitru.
4 indhak Kaariyam Raajaavin Paarvaikkum Samastha Sabaiyin Paarvaikkum Nyaayamaaik Kaanappattadhu.

5 ezhudhiyirukkirapadi Vegukaalamaai Avargal Adhai Aasarikkavillai; Aagaiyaal Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkup Paskaavai Aasarikkumpadi Erusalemukku Vaarungal Endru Peyersebaamudhal Thaanmattumulla Isravelukku Parai Saatruviththaargal.

6 appadiye Raajaavum Avanudaiya Prabukkalum Koduththa Nirubangalai Anjalkaarar Vaangi, Raajaavudaiya Kattalaiyinpadiye Isravel Yoodhaa Engumpoi: Isravel Puththirare, Aabiragaam Isravel Enbavargaludaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththaridaththukkuth Thirumbungal; Appozhudhu Aseeriyarudaiya Raajaakkalin Kaikkuth Thappiyirukkira Meedhiyaana Ungalandaikku Avar Thirumbuvaar.

7 thangal Pidhaakkalin Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Dhrogampannina Ungal Pidhaakkalaippolavum Ungal Sagodhararaippolavum Iraadheyungal; Adharkaaga, Neengal Kaangirapadiye, Avargal Paazhaaippogiradharku Oppukkoduththaare.

8 ippodhum Ungal Pidhaakkalaippola Ungal Kazhuththaik Kadinappaduththaadheyungal; Neengal Karththarukku Udanpattu, Avar Sadhaakaalaththukkum Parisuththampannina Avarudaiya Parisuththa Sthalaththirku Vandhu, Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Seviyungal; Appozhudhu Avarudaiya Ukkiramaana Kobam Ungalaivittuth Thirumbum.

9 neengal Karththaridaththukkuth Thirumbinaal, Ungal Sagodhararum Ungal Pillaigalum Thangalai Siraipidiththavargalukku Munbaaga Irakkam Perugiradharkum, Indha Dhesaththirkuth Thirumbugiradharkum Adhu Edhuvaagum; Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Kirubaiyum Irakkamumullavar; Neengal Avaridaththirkuth Thirumbinaal, Avar Thammudaiya Mugaththai Ungalaivittu Vilakkuvadhillai Endraargal.
10 appadi Andha Anjalkaarar Eppiraayeem Manaase Dhesangalil Sebulon Mattukkum Oorooraagath Thirindhaargal; Aanaalum Avargal Ivargalaippaarththu Nagaiththup Parigaasampanninaargal.
11 aagilum Aaserilum, Manaaseyilum, Sebulonilum, Silar Manaththaazhmaiyaagi Erusalemukku Vandhaargal.
12 yoodhaavilum Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyinpadiye, Raajaavum Prabukkalum Kattalaiyittapragaaram Seygiradharku, Dhevanudaiya Karam Avargalai Orumanappaduththitru.
13 appadiye Irandaam Maadhaththil Pulippillaadha Appappandigaiyai Aasarikka Vegu Janangal Erusalemil Magaaperiya Sabaiyaaik Koodinaargal.
14 avargal Ezhumbi, Erusalemil Undaana Palipeedangalaiyum, Thoobapeedangalaiyum Agatrik Keedharon Aatrilepottaargal.

15 pinbu Andha Irandaam Maadham Padhinaalaanthedhiyil Paskaavin Aattukkuttigalai Adiththaargal; Aasaariyarum Leviyarum Vetki, Thangalai Suththampanni, Sarvaanga Thaganapaligalaik Karththarudaiya Aalayaththirkuk Konduvandhu,

16 dhevanudaiya Manushanaagiya Moseyin Nyaayappramaanaththirku Etra Thangal Muraimaiyinpadiye Thangal Sthaanaththile Nindraargal; Aasaariyar Leviyarin Kaiyilirundhu Raththaththai Vaangiththeliththaargal.

17 sabaiyile Anegar Thangalaip Parisuththampannikkollaadhirundhaargal; Aagaiyaal Suththamillaa Ellaaraiyum Karththarukkup Parisuththampanna, Leviyar Avargalukkaagap Paskaavin Aattukkuttigalai Adikkum Kaariyaththai Visaariththaargal.
18 adhenendraal Eppiraayeem, Manaase, Isakkaar, Sebulon Manusharil Eraalamaana Anegam Janangal Thangalai Suththampannikkollaadhirundhum, Ezhudhiyiraadhapragaaramaagap Paskaavai Saappittaargal.

19 esekkiyaa Avargalukkaaga Vinnappampanni, Thangal Pidhaakkalin Dhevanaagiya Karththaraana Dhevanaith Thedumpadikku, Thangal Irudhayaththai Neraakkinavargal Parisuththa Sthalaththirketra Suththaangam Adaiyaadhirundhaalum, Kirubaiyulla Karththar Avargal Ellaarukkum Mannippaaraaga Endraan.
20 karththar Esekkiyaavin Vinnappaththaik Kettu, Janangalukku Anugoolancheydhaar.

21 appadiye Erusalemile Kaanappatta Isravel Puththirar Pulippillaadha Appappandigaiyai Ezhunaalalavum Magaa Aanandhaththode Aasariththaargal; Leviyarum Aasaariyarum Dhinandhinam Karththarukkendru Perosaiyaaith Thonikkum Keedhavaaththiyangalaal Karththaraith Thudhiththukkondirundhaargal.

22 karththarukku Aduththa Kaariyaththil Nalla Unarvulla Ellaa Leviyarodum Esekkiyaa Patchamaaip Pesinaan; Ippadi Avargal Pandigaiyin Ezhunaalalavum Pusiththu, Sthoththirapaligalai Seluththi, Thangal Pidhaakkalin Dhevanaagiya Karththaraith Thudhiththukkondirundhaargal.
23 pinbu Vere Ezhunaalalavum Aasarikka Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Yosanaipanni, Andha Ezhunaalum Aanandhaththode Aasariththaargal.

24 yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Esekkiyaa Sabaikku Aayiram Kaalaigalaiyum Ezhaayiram Aadugalaiyum Koduththaan; Prabukkalum Sabaikku Aayiram Kaalaigalaiyum Padhinaayiram Aadugalaiyum Koduththaargal; Aasaariyaril Anegamper Thangalai Suththampanninaargal.

25 yoodhaavin Sabaiyanaiththum, Aasaariyarum, Leviyarum, Isravelilirundhu Vandhavargaludaiya Sabaiyanaiththumaagiya Isravel Dhesaththilirundhuvandha Anniyarum Yoodhaavil Kudiyirundhavargalum Magizhchchiyaayirundhaargal.
26 appadiye Erusalemil Magaa Sandhosham Undaayirundhadhu; Dhaaveedhin Kumaaranaagiya Saalomon Ennum Israveludaiya Raajaavin Naatkalmudharkondu Ippadi Erusalemil Nadandhadhillai.

27 leviyaraana Aasaariyargal Ezhundhunindru, Janaththai Aaseervadhiththaargal; Avargaludaiya Saththam Ketkappattu, Avargaludaiya Vinnappam Avarudaiya Parisuththa Vaasasthalamaagiya Paralogaththil Vandhu Ettinadhu.
